title: Happy Journey (2014)
overview: Happy Journey is a 2014 Malayalam drama film written by Arunlal and directed by Boban Samuel, starring Jayasurya, Aparna Gopinath and Lal.
storyline: A blind cricketer pursues his dream and tries to make an Indian blind cricket team a reality.
plot: The story narrates the life of a young man from Fort Kochi named Aaron (Jayasurya),who loses his eyesight during his school days in an accident who then to find a place in the Indian cricket team for the blind.
